description: Whether you're hoofing through the snow to the gym, racking up for tomorrow's big climb, or enjoying the sunset with a few adult bevies in camp, the Nevadan™ Down Vest sends a winter-worthy dose of warmth straight to the core. This go-to vest easily layers over a flannel or lighter jacket, and Mountain Hardwear even added a pair of beverage-sized drop pockets to keep your extras at the ready.
name: Mountain Hardwear Nevadan Down Vest - Mens
